IndexClipperExecuteRectClipLines


ExecuteRectClipLines

Delphifunction ExecuteRectClipLines(const rect: TRect64; const subjects: TPaths64): TPathsD;

Delphifunction ExecuteRectClipLines(const rect: TRectD; const subjects: TPathsD): TPathsD;


C++Paths64 ExecuteRectClipLines(const Rect64 rect, const Paths64& subjects);

C++PathsD ExecuteRectClipLines(const RectD rect, const PathsD& subjects);


C# public static Paths64 ExecuteRectClipLines(Rect64 rect, Paths64 subjects);

C# public static PathsD ExecuteRectClipLines(RectD rect, PathsD subjects);


ExecuteRectClipLines intersects subject open paths (polylines) with the specified rectangular clipping region.

This function is extremely fast when compared to the Library's general purpose Intersect clipper. Where Intersect has roughly O(n³) performance, ExecuteRectClipLines has O(n) performance.


See Also

ExecuteRectClip, Intersect, Paths64, PathsD, Rect64, RectD
